fields.label: Show a Single Feature?
fields.name: featured_single_option
fields.message: Hide the 5 featured boxes and show a single, full-width feature box

sub_fields.label: Box Heading
sub_fields.name: box_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: override the box heading, otherwise, the post type's default will be used.

sub_fields.label: Large Image
sub_fields.name: custom_image_large
sub_fields.instructions: The image shown on devices 640px wide and up.

sub_fields.label: Small Image
sub_fields.name: custom_small_image
sub_fields.instructions: The image shown on devices 639px wide and smaller. If not provided, the large image will be used.
